Context:
To become a Program Advisory Committee member at George Brown College, individuals will work with industry leaders, alumni, and faculty on program and curriculum development. This involves sharing real-world insights to keep the curriculum timely, relevant, engaging, and reflective of industry trends. Interested individuals can contact Joey Delle Monache, Division Manager of Marketing & Recruitment at joey.dellemonache@georgebrown.ca to get connected with an academic division for program development. For more information, please visit the college's website or sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, and upcoming events by clicking "Sign Up Now." The college can be reached at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559. The email address for general inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Contact Information:
- Joey Delle Monache, Division Manager of Marketing & Recruitment, joey.dellemonache@georgebrown.ca
- George Brown College, 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Note: The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
